cast.name: 安德里亚·布里兰特斯 Andrea Brillantes

introduction: Sam is known to be the rich wild child of Rosehill Academy. Popular and pretty, she feels like she is on top of the world, pulling one prank after another and bullying her peers. In an effort to teach Sam a lesson, her dad transfers her to a public school. Stripped of all privileges, Sam tries to prove to her dad that she can survive one whole year in this new environment. Then comes Jake, the less-privileged ladies' man from this new school. As Jake helps Sam adjust to the challenging life in Quiapo, the unlikely pair eventually finds love in this wild little world.
